page.title: 12 Leisure Time Interests
page.content: People in Bruton have a variety of leisure time interests.The activities range from collecting novelty perfume bottles to wine making.The most popular hobbies seem to be gardening, walking,reading and all types of handicraft. In activities that require a good deal of patience and practice people usually start young.For instance a local resident started playing the piano when she was four years old.Since then she has attempted recorder,organ,guitar,violin and cornet.She learnt from this that it was best to start at an early age and practice regularly. Surprisingly some people like home maintenance.One man enjoys ringing bells,caravanning,board games and table tennis.Some people find pleasure in being with children.
